name: My First Ever 2D Animation Puppet
description:
This is the very first animation Puppet I have designed.  Although she was only ever used for unseen test footage,  she serves as a reminder of how far we've gotten.

Her name is Owka the Witch. 

2d Animation Puppet

Traditionally drawn with color pencils markers, and sharpies

comes with several mouth pieces and hand poses

asset for gaming or animation.

https://www.artstation.com/quterious
